com.wikiaudioapp.wikiaudio.location

Class LocationHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.wikiaudioapp.wikiaudio.location.LocationHandler

  • public class LocationHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    This is where we handle location related actions - from marking wikipages on the map to checking if the user moved "enough" so we'll present it a new Nearby playlist.
